Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the R. Premadasa Stadium, Colombo is a balanced pitch. The average 1st innings score at this venue in the last 20 matches is 217 runs. The team batting first at this venue has won 58% of its matches, so the toss does not make much of a difference here.
SL vs IND Dream11 Team Today: Batters: Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma, Charith Asalanka and Sadeera Samarawickrama
All-Rounders: Dunith Wellalage and Janith Liyanage
Bowlers: Akila Dananjaya, Jeffrey Vandersay, Mohammed Siraj and Maheesh Theekshana
